turkish_example_sentence: Sen rehbere yol hakkında sormamışsan, kaybolup giderdin.
english_example_sentence: If you had not asked the guide about the road, you would have gotten lost.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не спросил гида о дороге, ты бы заблудился.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen rehbere yol hakkında ______, kaybolup giderdin.
